meanings.definition: To push back or resist pressure.
meanings.sent1: She tried to pressback against the heavy door to keep it closed.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to pressback against the opposing team's offense.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted to pressback against the vacuum cleaner, thinking it was a threat.
meanings.sent4: The tree roots continued to pressback against the force of the storm, staying firmly in the ground.
meanings.sent5: The child learned to pressback against the bully, standing up for themselves.

meanings.definition: A type of chair with a back that can be pushed back.
meanings.sent1: The pressback chair in the living room was perfect for relaxing after a long day.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed sitting in the pressback chair and reading her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The pressback chair surprised the guests when it reclined automatically.
meanings.sent4: The pressback chair in the office was a symbol of comfort and relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The pressback chair creaked slightly as she leaned back in it.
